慒字的基本解释

慒
cáo
乱。

慒
cóng
谋虑。

慒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cóng］
［《廣韻》藏宗切，平冬，從。］
谋虑。
[②]［cáo］
［《玉篇》昨遭切］
昏乱。

慒字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慒； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页398第27
【唐韻】藏宗切【集韻】【韻會】徂宗切，?與悰通。【說文】慮也。从心曹聲。　又【集韻】臧曹切，音糟。【玉篇】亂也。　又【廣韻】似由切【集韻】【韻會】徐由切，?與?通。【爾雅·釋言】慮也。　又【正韻】慈秋切，音酋。義同。◎按第三切，集韻韻會皆切邪母，而正韻獨切從母，此則正韻爲得也。蓋上兩切皆從母，則第三切不應又是邪母。以《說文》諧聲之理求之，曹字止是從母也。

慒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
慒字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慒; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 398 27
[Tang Yun] Zongzong cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Zuzong cut,? And 悰通. [Said the text] also worry about it. Cao Sheng from the heart.　[Jiyun] Zang Caoqie, the sound is bad. [Jade articles] Chaos too.　[Guang Yun] like Youqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Xu Youqie,? And? Are connected. 【Erya·Interpretation】Think about it.　[Zheng Yun] Ciqiuqie, sound chief. The same meaning. ◎According to the third cut, Jiyun Yun will cut all evil mothers, while Zheng Yun cuts from the mother alone, so the Zheng Yun is also a gain. If both parts of the cover are from the mother, the third part shouldn't be the evil mother again. According to the principle of "Shuowen", the word Cao is only from the mother.
